triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: The paper builds upon established principles of swarm robotics for multi-robot coordination.

triples.name: Underwater robotics
triples.relevance: The Blueswarm system is specifically designed for underwater operation, requiring underwater robotics technologies.

triples.name: Collective animal behavior
triples.relevance: The paper leverages principles from collective animal behavior to enable self-organization in robot swarms.

triples.name: Bio-inspired robotics
triples.relevance: The fish-inspired design approach uses bio-inspired robotics principles for swarm coordination.

triples.name: Robot fish
triples.relevance: The paper proposes fish-inspired robots that form a collective swarm system for underwater coordination.
